column3: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
